value.title: Learn Starcraft - Advanced Guide (Masters Commentary Hour Vol. 1)
value.excerpt: They said if I stopped talking they'd take away my ladder points. Next one I upload will have more terran/toss blame RNGesus.

value.title: Learn Starcraft - SPEEDRUN TO MASTERS RANDOM | 30 Wins, 0 Losses - Terran, Zerg & Protoss
value.excerpt: Making sure to use safe, solid builds to get an advantage when playing smart! Most build orders I think could be copied to success for platinum/diamond players.  Watch the stream - https://www.twitch.tv/wintergaming Tweeter - https://www.twitter.com/starcraftwinter Patreon - https://www.patreon.com/wintergaming

value.title: Pig Coaches Winter! Learning Starcraft (Pro Coaches Grandmaster)
value.excerpt: Pig is a former professional player who now streams regularly and is one of the top 50 Grandmaster players on NA as random, and is still one of the best zergs in the world. Check him out:  https://www.youtube.com/user/PiGstarcraft https://www.twitch.tv/x5_pig https://twitter.com/x5_PiG

value.title: Learn Starcraft - Build Orders Vs Zerg (Terran, Zerg & Protoss Build Guide)
value.excerpt: A build as each race versus Zerg! These are general build guides, not exact textbook orders, because no plan survives contact with the enemy! Timestamps: 0:15 - Terran vs Zerg 11:00 - Protoss vs Zerg 24:00 - Zerg vs Zerg
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/yy1fhaHPAPM" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Learn Starcraft - Advanced Guide (Diamond to Masters All Races) Part 1 [Updated 2018]
value.excerpt: A guide for more experienced players, detailing the things that diamond (and below) players frequently miss, and what to look for! Covers all races and builds. Required: https://www.sc2replaystats.com Replay Pack of All the Games: https://drive.google.com/open?id=16TEQx8mNyKoiKJvymM3l7Vnb5X53HHrX  Thumbnail

value.title: Learn Starcraft - Beginner Timing Attacks & All-Ins (Terran, Zerg & Protoss)
value.excerpt: A few basic builds that can get you far when done fairly well. Also important is how not to overextend and lose everything.
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/8xOuROdh6t0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Learn to play Starcraft: Zerg Starter Guide #2 [BUILD ORDER] (Updated 2017 LOTV)
value.excerpt: We go over a very basic Zerg build order designed to get you into the midgame with a good economy and options. These guides are in no particular order, nor are they meant for COMPLETELY NEW (less than 10 games) players, instead are all meant to help improve generally!
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Jb-fmYlR6fI" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Learn to play Starcraft - Zerg Beginner Guide #1 - Updated (2017)
value.excerpt: We go over the basic mechanics of zerg and show the importance of understanding at least some of what your opponent is doing.  This guide is meant for players with an understanding of the objectives of starcraft but without any strong direction or gameplan, especially for each specific race! -- Watch
